trans-unit.source: Extends design-time behavior for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> Web server control.
The following code example demonstrates how to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 확장 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The code overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to display a five-point border that is purple if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 코드는 재정의 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> 5 포인트 테두리를 표시 하려면 메서드 자주색 경우 즉는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> 컨트롤을 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> to associate the designer with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제를 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> 디자이너와 연결 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner" /> class.
Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control can be resized.
<see langword="true" /> if the data list has templates; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 데이터 목록에 템플릿이; 경우 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> object associated with this designer.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: 이 디자이너와 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" /> for which to create the template editing frame.
Creates a template editing frame using the specified verb.
An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame" /> object.
Rather than using editing frames, use template groups and designer editing regions.
trans-unit.target: 편집 프레임을 사용 하지 않고 템플릿 그룹 및 편집 영역 디자이너를 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>.
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>를 참조하세요.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both the managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only the unmanaged resources.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner" /> object and optionally releases the managed resources.

When `disposing` is `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner.Dispose%2A> method releases all resources held by the managed objects that this <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner> object references.
trans-unit.target: 때 `disposing` 은 `true`, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner.Dispose%2A> 메서드는 관리 개체가 보유 하는 모든 리소스를 해제 합니다.이 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner> 개체에서 참조 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> method can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> 메서드는 다른 개체에서 여러 번 호출할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: When overriding it, ensure that you do not reference objects that have been disposed in an earlier call to <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />.
trans-unit.target: 멤버 함수를 재정의 하는 경우 확인 한 이전 호출에서 삭제 된 개체를 참조 하지 않도록 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 구현 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />, 참조 [Dispose 메서드를 구현](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" /> methods, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> 및 <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" /> 메서드 참조 [관리 되지 않는 리소스 정리](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 및 [Finalize 메서드를 재정의](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached template editing verbs available to the designer.
An array of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" /> objects consisting of the cached template editing verbs that are available to the designer.
Rather than using editing frames, use template groups and designer editing regions.
trans-unit.target: 편집 프레임을 사용 하지 않고 템플릿 그룹 및 편집 영역 디자이너를 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>.
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>를 참조하세요.

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTML used to represent the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control at design time.
The HTML that is used to represent the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control at design time.
The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 재정의 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: It alters the appearance of the control on the design surface if the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤의 경우 디자인 화면에 컨트롤의 모양을 변경 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성은 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The code uses `Try...Catch...Finally` syntax to do the following:
trans-unit.target: 코드를 사용 하 여 `Try...Catch...Finally` 에서 다음을 수행 하려면 다음 구문을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The `Try` section changes the values of the properties of the control.
trans-unit.target: `Try` 섹션 컨트롤의 속성 값을 변경 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The `Catch` section catches any exceptions and sends them to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: `Catch` 섹션 예외를 catch 사람에 게 보냅니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: The `Finally` section sets the properties to their original values.
trans-unit.target: `Finally` 섹션 원래 값으로 속성을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: 이 코드 예제는에 대해 제공 된 큰 예제의 일부는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTML used to represent an empty template-based control at design time.
The HTML used to represent an empty template-based control at design time.
The exception that occurred.
Gets the HTML to display at design time for the specified exception when an error has been encountered while rendering the control.
The HTML displayed at design time for the specified exception.

The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to modify the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control on the design surface when an exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 재정의 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> 의 모양을 수정 하는 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> 예외가 발생할 때 디자인 화면에서 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: 이 코드 예제는에 대해 제공 된 큰 예제의 일부는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the template.
Gets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.System#Web#UI#IDataItemContainer#DataItem" /> property of the template container.
The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.System#Web#UI#IDataItemContainer#DataItem" /> property of the container of the template.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataItemProperty%2A> method is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataItemProperty%2A> 메서드는 사용 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: To access the template metadata, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition>.
trans-unit.target: 템플릿 메타 데이터에 액세스 하려면 참조 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame" /> instance from which to get the content.
The name of the template.
<see langword="true" /> if the template's content can be edited; <see langword="false" /> if the content is read-only.
Gets the content of the template.
The content of the template.
Rather than using editing frames, use template groups and designer editing regions.
trans-unit.target: 편집 프레임을 사용 하지 않고 템플릿 그룹 및 편집 영역 디자이너를 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>.
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>를 참조하세요.

trans-unit.source: The control element being designed.
Initializes the designer with the specified component.

The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> method to ensure that the designer is initialized only with instances of the `SimpleDataList` class.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 재정의 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> 디자이너가의 인스턴스와 초기화 될 수 있도록 메서드는 `SimpleDataList` 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: 이 코드 예제는에 대해 제공 된 큰 예제의 일부는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source to which the underlying control is bound loads a new schema.
Override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method to perform additional actions that might be required when new schema becomes available.
trans-unit.target: 재정의 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> 메서드를 새 스키마 사용 가능 해지면 필요할 수 있는 추가 작업을 수행 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Called when the template editing verbs change.
Rather than using editing verbs, use template groups and designer editing regions.
trans-unit.target: 편집 동사를 사용 하는 대신 템플릿 그룹과 디자이너 편집 영역을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>.
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>를 참조하세요.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame" /> instance for which to set the content.
The name of the template.
The new content for the template.
Sets the content for the specified template and frame.
Rather than using editing verbs, use template groups and designer editing regions.
trans-unit.target: 편집 동사를 사용 하는 대신 템플릿 그룹과 디자이너 편집 영역을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>.
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>를 참조하세요.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether there are templates defined for the associated control.
<see langword="true" /> if the associated control has templates defined; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 연결 된 컨트롤에 있는 경우 템플릿이 정의 되어 있습니다. 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />합니다.
